name: World Generation Test
description:
scrapped project: just makes a cool randomly generated island. would've been made into survival game but got bored

controls: wasd to move, move mouse to look, right click to inspect, left click to interact. r to re-gen island

IMPORTANT: NOTHING HAPPENS WHEN A TASK IS COMPLETE. YOU ARE JUST WASTING TIME SO DON'T WAIT FOR THE TASK TO FINISH, JUST PRESS R
